definition[0]: wet earth that has become soft and sticky
example[0]: By the end of the game, all the kids were covered in mud.
example[1]: The path beside the river was slippery with mud.
example[2]: Many villages in Mali consist of mud huts.
example[3]: boots caked with mud (=covered in mud)
example[4]: It was impossible to move the car â€“ its wheels had got stuck in the mud.
